name: Big Dreams & Casual Nudity
description:
The First project demo I'm doing is called "Big Dreams and Casual Nudity", and it should be exactly as the title suggets.

This Febraury I've been working on the intro and general design of this game. So far the intro scene is mostly done. Next would be working on chat (vn like) and general gameplay.

I'm making the Art and Programming the game too. So if you like either the mechanics or the visuals. I'd appreciate a lot if you enabled me to keep making similar content for you.
